headline: Palantir AI Partnerships And Defense Work Weighed Against Rich Valuation
summary: Palantir Technologies (NasdaqGS:PLTR) has entered a new partnership with Rackspace to speed up deployment of its AI platforms across global enterprises, with a focus on regulated sectors. The company is also involved in a new U.S. defense engagement with GE Aerospace, applying its AI to support the Air Force’s critical training fleet. At the same time, Palantir is facing fresh public sector scrutiny that may influence how its healthcare and defense work is perceived and awarded. Palantir’s...
